text: Not so fast! Madonna was hit with a series of “ uncomfortable questions ” by a judge before she was granted permission to adopt her 4 - year - old twin girls from Malawi, the presiding judge said in court documents obtained by The Associated Press on Wednesday, February 8. “ The petitioner is a professional performer and I guarded myself against the danger of her merely reciting a well - rehearsed speech by asking her some rather uncomfortable questions to which she gave very candid answers, ” Judge Fiona Mwale said in her ruling, explaining her reasons for approving the adoption.
